text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActEncounterCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActEncounterAccommodationCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ObservationType
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActTransportationModeCode

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _ActTransportationModeCodeActTransportationModeCodeCharacterizes how a transportation act was or will be carried out.

    *Examples:* Via private transport, via public transit, via courier.
